Installation

Get started with the Enterprise Design System by installing our package:

npm install @Enterprise/design-system

Or if you're using yarn:

yarn add @Enterprise/design-system

Setup

Import our styles in your main CSS file:

@import '@Enterprise/design-system/styles';

Or include it in your HTML:

<link rel="stylesheet" href="@Enterprise/design-system/styles.css">

Basic Usage

Start using our components by following our core principles:

  • Use our predefined color palette
  • Follow our spacing guidelines
  • Maintain consistent border radius
  • Implement proper typography

Example of a primary button:

<button class="bg-primary hover:bg-primary-dark text-white rounded-fds px-6 py-3">
Click me
</button>
